body: Ah yes ishowspeed saying weird things again
How does one have intercourse without moaning? That would just sound dead and emotionless…unless that’s his kink
I'm kinda curious, are there really guys out there that gets turn-off when hearing his partner moaning so much during sex ? I thought all guys would love it, since that's just hot to me.
Lol why does her ass look wrinkly on page 9

@tee hee: Lol, what do you mean "almost"? In this particular case, it IS the husband's fault ENTIRELY that his woman cheated on him! His kind of attitude toward sex is actually part of why ppl even cheat in the first place tbh. Yeah, his wife shouldn't have done it, but honestly... SIX YEARS!? I'm sorry, but the husband brought that shit upon himself. I got NO sympathy for him. At all. Karma can be a real bitch sometimes...
I know cheating is wrong and shit, but this almost literally the husband's fault. 6 years? Seriously bro!!!!!
